fields.text: Welcome to 23andMe in South Bay, offering you over 125 personalized ancestry, health, and trait reports.
For ancestry insights and heritage reports, press [INDEX].
For health and trait report inquiries, press [INDEX].
To speak with a genetic counselor about your ancestry results, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we connect you to a genetic counseling specialist.
For assistance with your DNA kit or sample collection, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we connect you to our sample support team.
To discuss your health report findings with a genetic counselor, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we connect you to a health counseling specialist.
For help interpreting your trait reports, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we connect you to our traits support team.
